description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+12 vs AC; 2d8+4 damage (crit +1d8).

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+12 vs AC; 2d8+4 damage.

Encounter ✦ Acid

Standard

Ranged 5

+10 vs Reflex; 2d6+4 acid damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

The bugbear assassin makes two longsword or two crossbow attacks.
A bugbear assassin's attack deals 1d10 extra damage to any target granting combat advantage to it.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When hit by a melee attack

The bugbear assassin shifts 1 square and makes an attack against the triggering creature; +10 vs. Will; on a hit, any marks placed on the assassin by the triggering creature are removed and the triggering creature grants combat advantage to the assassin.

Poison

Minor

As a minor action, the assassin can apply one of the following three poisons to its weapons. Once it applies the poison, it gains a secondary attack against the next target it damages with that weapon. The assassin can use only one poison on a weapon at a time. If it applies another poison before damaging an enemy with its first poison, the initial poison is wasted.

Mindfire PoisonSecondary Attack: +10 vs. Will; the target is blinded (save ends).

Ghoul BloodSecondary Attack: +10 vs. Fortitude; the target is immobilized (save ends).

Scorpion VenomSecondary Attack: +10 vs. Fortitude; the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is slowed (save ends both).

Encounter

Minor

The assassin deals 1d6 extra damage against the next target granting combat advantage to it.

AC 21Fort 21Ref 20Will 18
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 17 (+6)

Cha 14 (+5)
Languages Common, Giant
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +10, Stealth +12, Thievery +12Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 15 | Insight 15

Equipment crossbow , crossbow bolt x10, dagger , leather armor , longsword .
